name: Choose Your Fragrance Organic Shea Souffle'  4oz  Skincare- Vegan Whipped body butter
description:
Now that the cooler weather is coming, it's time to moisturize your skin and protect it from the drying effects of winter. Naturally and organically protect your skin. The formula keeps improving with 100% organic oils, never any animal products and it is safe for vegans.

Shea Souffle' is a wonderful combination of organic shea butter and organic oils.

Whipped organic shea souffle' is made to compliment the fragrances of the Dianjane organic and natural shea butter soaps. You really need very little to keep your skin moist all day without feeling greasy. It's almost good enough to eat!

You can choose from the fragrances below in 4 oz sizes:

Fragrance Free
Asian Lavender
Rose Lavender
Somalian Rose
Lapis Blue
Hibiscus Rose
Lily of the Valley
Peruvian Pear
Brazilian Lemongrass
Tunisian Tangerine
Gardenia
Anguillan Lime
Tahitian Peach
Moroccan Sandalwood
Pink Grapefruit
Peppermint

name: Organic Rose Lavender Shea Butter Vegan Soap- with Organic Cocoa Butter and Coconut Milk
description:
This is a new Vegan soap formula that has been developed for creaminess, moisturizing and cleansing with absolutely awesome fragrance!
No artificial Ingredients or colors, No animal products...not even beeswax!
Organic and Vegan formula.

It can’t get any better than this! A layer of luxurious lavender over creamy rose soap is a heavenly combination for any skin type. 

LAVENDER is a herbal shrub with amazing qualities that has been treasured throughout the ages. Though this plant is a native of the Mediterranean, it is now grown all around the world.
Rose Geranium is suitable for ALL skin types! Its regulating properties make it useful for balancing too oily, dry or combination skin types.

ROSE CLAY is a mild kaolin clay that can be used on normal to dry skin to gently cleanse and exfoliate the skin while improving the skin
All of my soaps are handmade from the best quality organic food grade oils and butters. This one is scented with Rose Geranium Essential oil and Lavender essential oil and smells great! It is soothing to the skin and has lots of creamy bubbles, leaving your skin clean and moisturized.

SHEA BUTTER-After being extracted from the Shea nuts, the appearance of Organic Virgin Shea Butter is a tan pale yellowish color and carries a characteristic scent. Shea Butter nourishes the skin with Vitamins A, E and F. Vitamins A and E help maintain the skin and keep it clear and healthy.
Also, Shea Butter easily penetrates the skin allowing the skin to breathe and not clogging pores. Shea Butter has a high level of cinnamic acid, a natural sun screen.

COCONUT MILK is loaded with beneficial fats, nutrients and minerals
Coconut milk's moisturizing properties soothe the ski

COCOA BUTTER- is the cream-colored fat extracted from cacao seeds (cocoa beans) and has been called the ultimate moisturizer, and has been used to keep skin soft and supple for centuries.

Listing is for one 5 oz bar.

name: Organic Creamy Honey Shea Butter Natural Soap- Unscented
description:
This soap is great for people, neglected, sensitive or weathered skin.

I have been tweeking this recipe for many years now and am so pleased with this version of Honey soap that it's named Honey Cream. This formula is very mild and loaded with shea butter, cocoa butter, coconut milk and a generous swirl of honey.

I am always striving to improve the formulas and make the most cleansing, moisturizing and nourishing soaps to anyone's bath experience. You've got to try it! The additional castor oil makes this bar for shampoo and leaves your hair shiny and clean without stripping it of the natural oils.

SHEA BUTTER-After being extracted from the Shea nuts, the appearance of Organic Virgin Shea Butter is a tan pale yellowish color and carries a characteristic scent. Shea Butter nourishes the skin with Vitamins A, E and F. Vitamins A and E help maintain the skin and keep it clear and healthy.
Also, Shea Butter easily penetrates the skin allowing the skin to breathe and not clogging pores. Shea Butter has a high level of cinnamic acid, a natural sun screen.

COCONUT MILK is loaded with beneficial fats, nutrients and minerals
Coconut milk's moisturizing properties soothe the ski

COCOA BUTTER- is the cream-colored fat extracted from cacao seeds (cocoa beans) and has been called the ultimate moisturizer, and has been used to keep skin soft and supple for centuries.

HONEY is natural skin emollient which draws moisture and feeds the skin with nutrients. Honey attracts the dirt from skin pores and dead skin cells from the surface of the skin. Your skin will feel clean and refreshed without any dryness and it’s warm fragrance is natural from the honey.

All of my soaps are handmade from the best quality organic food grade oils and butters. They are fragrance free or scented with quality essential oils and smell great! They will leave your skin clean and moisturized.
Listing is for one 5 oz bar.

name: Organic Lapis Blue Shea Butter Herbal Vegan Soap- with Organic Cocoa Butter
description:
The wonderful ingredients in this new soap are an herbal adventure so good for your skin. The complex formula and ingredients are best for normal to oily skin.

This fragrance begins with crisp citrus followed by herbal rosemary, clary sage and and mellows down to an exotic musk. It's a sophisticated blend that appeals to men or women. Very sexy and exotic.

The soap is beautiful and romantic with an amazing fragrance blended from essential oils and natural herbs. There are swirls of cream surrounded by blue and infused with chamomile, comfrey, lemon balm, lavender buds and calendula herbs. The soap is topped with dried blue cornflowers.

No artificial colors, No animal products...not even beeswax!
Organic and Vegan formula.

SHEA BUTTER-After being extracted from the Shea nuts, the appearance of Organic Virgin Shea Butter is a tan pale yellowish color and carries a characteristic scent. Shea Butter nourishes the skin with Vitamins A, E and F. Vitamins A and E help maintain the skin and keep it clear and healthy.
Also, Shea Butter easily penetrates the skin allowing the skin to breathe and not clogging pores. Shea Butter has a high level of cinnamic acid, a natural sun screen.

COCOA BUTTER- is the cream-colored fat extracted from cacao seeds (cocoa beans) and has been called the ultimate moisturizer, and has been used to keep skin soft and supple for centuries.

Listing is for one 5 oz bar.

name: Pick 5 Shea Butter Natural Soaps with Honey or Lavender or Rose and Citrus Essential oils 5 to 6 oz
description:
This is a great way to try some of our wonderfully natural and organic soaps!

Some will have herbal ingredients and coconut milk! Theses soaps are my newest and formulated to give your skin the nourishment it needs. All my soaps are made in the cold process method from food grade oils and natural herbal ingredients. My soaps are 75-90 percent organic.

Honey is used in some of the bars and is fantastically moisturizing. All of my soaps have a Shea Butter in them and your skin will feel great from this healing butter. I've also included cocoa and babassu butter in some of the soap formulas. The essential oils are great for their aromatherapy benefits and well being in the bath.

All include shea butter, olive oil, and coconut oil. They are about 5-6 ounces, so you have a nice size and will last a long time if not left in the water or out of the stream of your shower.

You can choose 5 new soaps from the list here:

Hibiscus Rose Geranium with Rose and Hibiscus petals
Ivory Coast Fragrance Free w/ Coconut Milk
Creamy Honey Shea Butter Natural Soap- Unscented 
Lapis Blue Shea Butter Herbal Vegan Soap- with Cocoa Butter 
Ivory Silk Fragrance Free w/ Real Tussah Silk
Honey Silk- Unscented w/ Honey and Tussah Silk
Gardens of Versailles floral with Cocoa Butter
Chinese Matcha Green Tea with Cocoa Butter
Lavender Oatmeal with Cocoa Butter
Lavender Silk w/ Tussah Silk
Oatmeal Silk w/ Tussah Silk
Citrus Silk w/ Tusasah Silk and Herbal Infused Oils
Mandarin Citrus w/ Honey and Oatmeal
Rose Lavender w/ Rose Clay and Essential oils


List your 5 soap selections in the note to seller when purchasing or just let us pick them for you!
